description: Provide a flexible MCP server implementation that integrates with external tools and resources to enhance LLM applications. Enable dynamic interaction with data and actions through a standardized protocol, improving the capabilities of AI agents. Simplify the connection between language models and real-world context for more effective automation and assistance.

capabilities.name: generate_va_abstract
capabilities.description:
JAMA Network makalesinden VA (Veterans Affairs) formatında görsel özet oluşturur.
Parametre verilmezse GITHUB_REPO / GITHUB_TOKEN ortam değişkenlerinden okunur.
